TextView.android:text: Planty Care is an AI-powered application designed to help farmers and agricultural enthusiasts identify diseases in fruits and vegetables. Our goal is to offer practical solutions that improve crop quality and reduce agricultural losses.
Built the Android app using Java with ready-made UI designs, set up Firebase backend, and integrated APIs for three ML models.
I handled UI/UX design and developed dashboards and visualizations for all project models.
Trained AI models for plant disease detection and crop prediction. handled full data pipeline.
I contributed to building the CNN model, developed the ML model for fertilizer recommendation.
Built a Flask API for plant disease detection, crop prediction, and fertilizer recommendation system.
I focused on the presentation and API development. I also contributed to the documentation and core model.
I contributed in a fertilizer recommendation model, writing the full technical documentation.
